ygData.msgSnippet: all is well again :o) with some creative computing I was able to copy & edit the 2 files that mysteriesly dissapeared over from my second comp.... Kerik! at
ygData.messageBody:
all is well again :o) with some creative computing I was able to copy
& edit the 2 files that mysteriesly dissapeared over from my second
comp....

Kerik! at leat get a new video card...it is so much better now that I
have my voodoo2 3000....but then you have the whole pci/agp debate &
may need new motherboard, and with that you need new...... and on and
on :o) this is how I made my second comp :o) all the upgrades I got
for my first, in a new case :o)

Ompa
